verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Thy blood and righteousness My beauty are, my glorious dress: â€™Midst flaming worlds, in these arrayed, With joy shall I lift up my head.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I believe the precious blood Which at the mercy-seat of God For ever doth for sinners plead, For me, even for my soul, was shed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I believe, were sinners more Than sands upon the ocean shore, You have for all a ransom paid, For all a full atonement made.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou God of power, Thou God of love, Let the whole world Thy mercy prove: Their beauty this, their glorious dress, Jesus the Lord, our righteousness.{/lang-eng}
